mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bh AS "bh", a.templateid AS "templateid", a.templatetitle AS "templatetitle", a.templatecontent AS "templatecontent", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.ison AS "ison"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_weixin_template( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, bh, templateid, templatetitle, templatecontent, ison ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{bh}, #{templateid}, #{templatetitle}, #{templatecontent}, #{ison} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_weixin_template SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, bh = #{bh}, templateid = #{templateid}, templatetitle = #{templatetitle}, templatecontent = #{templatecontent}, ison = #{ison} WHERE id = #{id}
